In this post, we will be creating a simple scalable dashboard that updates in real-time using React, GraphQL Subscriptions and Redis PubSub.

Why would you need a dashboard?

  • Monitor your infrastructure (servers, network, applications)
  • Monitor application traffic (transaction volume, number of users)
  • Alerts (application health, critical issues, downtimes)

Almost always, dashboards are backed up with one or more datasources.

What open-source applications are used for creating feature-rich dashboards?

  • Kibana - Used with ELK Stack
  • Grafana - Used with Prometheus, Graphite, OpenTSDB
